result.execSummary:
The defendant Devonte Rashad Maymon was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Devonte Rashad Maymon is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Devonte Rashad Maymon was found guilty of OWI (1st w/ Passenger < 16 Yrs Old), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Huber privileges subject to jail policies.  May transfer to Dane County.
Submit DNA sample.  $65.00 blood draw reimbursement fee.
Complete an AODA assessment and follow through with any treatment recommendations.  Counts 2,3,4 dismissed.
